name: B.O.T.S. - Battle Of The Steel
description:
*** B.O.T.S. - He lives! He walks! He conquers! ***
Calling all superheroes. The earth is under attack! Come and join the action... The Alien Invasion is here, and YOU are the only one who can put an end to it!

The Hero:
You play as the ultimate superhero, B.O.T.S. To help you with your mission you have some of the most advanced super weapons ever seen!

The Objective:
SAVE THE EARTH FROM THE ALIEN INVASION!

With your help B.O.T.S. can do it. Help him protect his precious earth! Use all the super weapons available to stop the invaders:

Beam Repulsor, Magnetic Replusor, Fire Replusor, Plasma Grenades & even Nuclear Missiles!

-----------------------------------

B.O.T.S. features:

* Simple, but powerful controls
* Tap, hold & release to fire
* Time your shots to build up massive combos
* Amazing HD Retina Display
* Master all the super weapons
* Crazy power-ups & special weapons
* Massive amount of achievements
* Level up & become the ultimate super hero
* Spin & win awesome prizes in the Bonus Game
* Compete against your Game Center friends

+ much more FANTASTIC action!

-----------------------------------
